website_summaries.verdict: A deft way to get vegetable-haters to eat their greens without a battle.
pros: Mixes three fruits – apples, apricots, and strawberries – tied together with cashews, which hide the taste of the spinach
cons: Smaller than the original Larabars, and a little bit gummier

customer_reviews.title: Short expiration date & bars smaller than what they are supposed to be
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, I buy regularly in grocery stores as a gluten free snack. It is absolutely delicious. However on this order I had a couple issues. First I noticed the expiration date was very short considering I was buying two boxes (less than 3 months out — much shorter than any I have bought before). Second and most concerning to me was that most all of the bars in one of the boxes were very small. Several were less than half the size of the normal bars. This was very disappointing, as this was the only place had been able to buy in this quantity.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for nut shells in the bars!
customer_reviews.text: Still evaluating, but I may have chipped a tooth. The last bar I ate had what appeared to be nut shell pieces in it. As I chewed down a large tooth crunch happened. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Duggy

customer_reviews.title: OMG!  Just no!
customer_reviews.text: The only experience I have with Laurabar's up until this purchase was the Blueberry Muffin which are fairly good. Trying to eat more healthfully in compact bar form, I figure I would buy the pineapple-kale bars. What a mistake. First, they are tiny. At ~1.25 ounces and 130 calories, they are barely two bites to a grown man. No value in the price when the blueberry are larger and cheaper. Second, and I guess last, the odor and taste are, let's see, how can I describe it...let's say someone decided to wash all the feet of the homeless and then took that water and made food with it. That would be close. Nope. Nope and just nope.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed some other Larabar products but I did not enjoy these very much. The spinach and cashew presence is negligible and the bars are really soft and jammy. Some folks might like that but I found them hard to eat slowly or cleanly and easy to damage in the pocket.
customer_reviews.author: R. S. Britton

customer_reviews.title: Expires soon!
customer_reviews.text: The bars themselves were good, my family loves them. My issue is that they expire within a month of when they were delivered. Amazon should do better than that. I'm sure that's not the case with all of them but I never would have bought them knowing I had so little time to eat them. Will stick to getting them at the local store in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these and will continue to order again
customer_reviews.text: Addicted. Love these and will continue to order again, as these are extremely expensive at the grocery stores. I do have to say, you have to be extremely careful, as sometimes you will find cashew shells mixed in, as it wasn't filtered out at the processing plant. These shells are very hard and may result in a chipped tooth. This doesn't happen too often compared to how many I eat. My favorite snack!
customer_reviews.author: Toia H.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: While the taste of these bars is wonderful, the danger that lurks within is not worth it. Today as I was sitting enjoying my bar, imagine my surprise as I bit down and the damn thing bit back. Well not really but might as well have. As I bit down I heard the grind and pop of my teeth, so as gross as it may be sat out the remainder and found a hard as a rock half shell and the pieces i actually cracked off of it . do not buy, stay away!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Barnard

customer_reviews.title: YOUR TEETH - BE CAREFUL
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt, these bars are tasty and healthy. I do love them.. BUT... and I can't stress this enough, CHEW EVERY BITE OF EVERY BAR SLOWLY AND CAREFULLY. Too many of these bars (if they contain dates or apricots) may have very hard pit pieces. I'm writing this right now only because I forgot to chew slowly and carefully and now I'm concerned I just cracked a tooth, or cracked a crown.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, do not taste the greens at all
customer_reviews.text: Great taste, do not taste the greens at all. My four year old son enjoys them. It is on the stickier side, meaning it gets into your teeth, more than the regular larabars do. They are great for healthy snacks on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Cali girl

customer_reviews.title: Best fruit bar
customer_reviews.text: The pineapple flavor of these is the Goldilocks’ porridge of fruit bars. ‘That’s It’ are too dry and have lots of hard bits. ‘Kind Pressed’ fruit bars have chia seeds and so will your teeth for the rest of the day. ‘One Bar’ are too small. But the Larabars are just right! The strawberry flavor of these has some seeds which are unpleasant but those are good, too. The cashew makes these creamy and substantial in a way other “just fruit” bars are not. [Update] Blueberry flavor is subtle and also very good, if it has seeds they're too tiny to be noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Finch

customer_reviews.title: Broken tooth!!
customer_reviews.text: So there’s nut shells in here and I ended up with a broken tooth!! Honestly I’ll go back to Kind brand of healthy fruit-veg bars. Too expensive (cost of replacing tooth) to continue eating these!!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Great way to get some fruit and vegetables in for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great way to get some fruit and vegetables in for a healthy snack. These are really moist, almost like an adult version of a fruit roll-up consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Allison K

customer_reviews.title: Taste is so-so but it sure is healthy
customer_reviews.text: I Love most of the other flavors of Larabar that I have purchased. I decided to try the healthier Fruits & Greens. One thing I will say is that you can honestly taste the GREENS in this. I naturally prefer the peanut butter or chocolate flavors and will probably not be buying this one again but they will not go to waste either. Slightly bitter taste but still 100% natural good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Chihuahua

customer_reviews.title: tasty and healthy combination of fruit and one vegetable
customer_reviews.text: These fruit and vegetable Lara Bars not only taste really good and are easy to chew but one bar is one serving of vegetables and one serving of fruit. There are no preservatives or any other ingredients other than pure fruit and puréed vegetables. Amazons price is $.50 per bar less than the best price you can get it at any grocery store except for the rare times when they are on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Wilkes

customer_reviews.title: Flavor profiles
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try these as I don't like sweet and/or chocolate bars. I'm fructose intolerant but can tolerate blueberries. Well, these taste just like raisins or prunes. My grandson even spit out his bite. VERY disappointing. Don't lead me to believe something will taste like blueberries if it isn't going to. My husband likes raisins (my Grandson and I do NOT) and he even thought the taste was unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: ... that is not packed with sugar and still tastes good. Healthy way to get greens into your diet
customer_reviews.text: One of the few bars that is not packed with sugar and still tastes good. Healthy way to get greens into your diet.
customer_reviews.author: PAS

customer_reviews.title: Found rocks!!!! Beware
customer_reviews.text: Repurchase this item because I love the ingredients. However this time was the last had the worst experience. Went to eat it as usual and found two big rocks in it that almost broke my teeth.I’m not understanding how ? Or why? But ewww I will never purchase or recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good to satisfy your hunger
customer_reviews.text: The first time I tried this bar, I didn’t love the taste of it, but I didn’t hate it either. It did, however, satisfy my hunger as an afternoon snack. Now that I’ve eaten about 6 or 7 of them, I like them! They satisfy my afternoon hunger better than any of the other bars I eat. I have these on subscribe & save now, and will continue to eat them! I think they’re worth a try!
customer_reviews.author: Leah D

customer_reviews.title: Not enough for a meal replacement, but a good little snack
customer_reviews.text: (Daniel's wife): These taste good (yep, like a smoothie) but they don't work for a breakfast, which is what I need. They are just not substantial enough. I think they would be better as a late afternoon snack, so if that's what you're looking for then get these.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Romero

customer_reviews.title: Larabar is great, but..
customer_reviews.text: Larabar no complaint. However, the box was open. Not a problem. The problem is that there were 14 bars instead of the 15 bars I purchased. Both larabar boxes were short one. I have never counted them before, but this time I did. I think someone must have been hungry while packing the box. Don't know why there is no seal on the box.
customer_reviews.author: Greatgrandma Gail

customer_reviews.title: I keep one in my bag at all times
customer_reviews.text: I love these!! I’m a picky eater and prefer snacking to meals, so this is great for me. Tastes great to me! Occasionally a harder chunk in a bar but never anything THAT hard like the shells some people mentioned. Yikes. I order two large boxes every month and haven’t had that happen so I don’t know how often that really occurs. Anyway, I like them : )
customer_reviews.author: Froggy

customer_reviews.title: Best Flavor for Date-Free Bars
customer_reviews.text: The strawberry spinach cashew is my favorite flavor of the Fruit + Greens bars. I love the original Larabars, but it's nice to have some date-free options too!
customer_reviews.author: LLB

customer_reviews.title: Although delicious they were Expired when I received them
customer_reviews.text: I love these but they are expired. Received them expired
customer_reviews.author: mindy

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love most Lara bar flavors so I was looking forward to trying these. I LOVED them! I put them in the freezer for a cold treat in the summer. I do not agree with other reviewers that said they almost chipped a tooth. These are soft and really a great treat. I've not found them to be very filling to use as a meal replacement but something to keep in my bag and eat on the go as a quick snack. Will order again. Nice to have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonwolf

customer_reviews.title: Love this flavor but beware the packaging
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy to be able to find this flavor on Amazon. Buyer should be aware that the product box itself is not sealed, when my order arrived the bars were scatter outside of its own packaging (inside the amazon box). Though each bar is individually packaged, I would prefer the whole thing is sealed to protect its integrity of the product.
customer_reviews.author: BananaC

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, healthy, and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something small and healthy that I could throw into my purse and take with me when I needed a snack. Most of the bars I see on the market are overly sweet and full of artificial ingredients. I love how this particular Larabar contains only apples, apricots, cashews, strawberries, and spinach. My five year old even requests one when she's hungry. I'm happy to be able to find ways to add a little more green into her diet. I've ordered this twice now and plan to order more when we run out!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Like
customer_reviews.text: I typically love Larabars and eat other flavors of Larabars frequently, but I did not prefer the taste or texture of these particular Larabars. The texture felt stickier and harder to chew than other Larabars and the fruit taste was a little bit more tart than sweet, but not a good tart. I know taste is personal preference, so some people might love these Larabars, they just weren't for me.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: No flavor.
customer_reviews.text: Not great. I was really looking forward to trying these, as I like the other fruit/veggie flavors, but they are pretty flavorless. Just kind of...nothing. I’ll stick with the pineapple going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Red4Liberty

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly delicious and wholesome snack super yum
customer_reviews.text: These are very dangerous. You should be very very careful. They remind me perhaps of the Lay's potato chips, you can't eat just one? But really they are so delicious that you want to eat more than one. Perfect wholesome snack
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Williams

customer_reviews.title: Sounds weird, tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about the kale/pineapple combo but these taste really good. As in, I do not taste any kale, lol. They are small but I find them to be a satisfying snack that perks me up on the trail or at work. Love larabar because it's a convenient bar without all the added sugar of most energy bars. Just sweet delicious fruit!
customer_reviews.author: AppleSnap

customer_reviews.title: Dried fruit with hard inedible chunks
customer_reviews.text: I love the date based bars but with that-Basically just a dried fruit bar... What I really didn't like was that there were hard pits or something in most of the bars that you can really hurt your teeth on. I'm sticking to the date based bars from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: Cai907

customer_reviews.title: Buy them. All of them.
customer_reviews.text: I'm personally writing about the strawberry spinach cashew bars. They are what dreams are made of. Mango is a close second. I've tried and enjoyed other "regular" flavors (apple pie, etc), but the strawberry taste like very much like fruit leather and aren't sweetened with dates. I have packed one in my Kindergartener's lunch everyday with zero complaints. They're also Whole30 compliant, and recommended as "emergency food" although, you should stick to chomp sticks or canned tuna--unless you keep these locked away in your trunk. Anyway. Buy the bars. They're the best thing.
customer_reviews.author: Liên Brewer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the flavor of these!
customer_reviews.text: Even though these are a mix of fruits, nuts, & greens, spinach is the last ingredient and you can truly not notice it's there. I can really taste the strawberry, and that's a great thing! This is pretty much my dessert when I need a sweet (yet not refined, sugary) treat.
customer_reviews.author: Just_Oreo

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting bar, but...
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor! This is now perhaps my favorite Larabar. However, they do fleece you a little. While charging the same as a regular Larabar, this bar is only 1.24 oz whereas a regular Larabar is 1.6 oz.
customer_reviews.author: Edward A. King

customer_reviews.title: N. G.
customer_reviews.text: these bars were awful! Gummy, stuck to my teeth and weren't at all what I expected. Years ago I used to eat these, but they weren't like this.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Olson

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: These taste a lot of apricot. It reminds me of the Apricot fruit leather my mom makes. It's refreshing to have a laura bar that doesn't just taste like dates. While it doesn't seem like there's a ton of it, the added spinach is a nice green treat too.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Freyh

customer_reviews.title: SOO GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a "bar" person, but these are SO GOOD! They're like eating a fruit roll up, except without all the added sugar. The short list of ingredients, the fair trade certification, and the consistent quality of them -- I honestly can't get enough of these bars!
customer_reviews.author: jules

customer_reviews.title: Great breakfast bar
customer_reviews.text: Great breakfast bar. I have one of these each morning and stay full until lunch time. They are nutritionally dense enough that I don't experience a mid morning crash.
customer_reviews.author: B oshields

customer_reviews.title: Not the best.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these but I just don’t. They are weirdly tart and stick to your teeth. My children wouldn’t even eat them and they will eat any granola/fruit-type bar I put in front of them. Definitely pass on these. The standard Lara Bars are way better.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like a fruit rollup!
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, this is the best Larabar flavor, hands down! The taste reminds me of a fruit roll up. You cannot taste the spinach whatsoever. The price is hard to beat if you get a subscription. They are also chewy and fresh - I've honestly never had a bad one. The only thing I will say is that every once in a while I get a piece that's not so chewy/kind of hard, but not a big deal. Kids will love these too. Great for throwing in a bag when you're on the go!
customer_reviews.author: DealDiva

customer_reviews.title: Great Gluten Free, Vegan snack
customer_reviews.text: I love these things. As someone with Celiac disease, eating at work can be a pain. Luckily, I have at least 1 of these every day I work and am very happy that they exist. My wife hates them though, somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Zov

customer_reviews.title: Balanced, real fruit taste
customer_reviews.text: Not too sweet but noticeably fruity taste without being bitter and the texture isn't too smooth or grainy, it's just right. If you're someone who gets a stomach ache when eating fruit or sweets on and empty stomach, these won't affect you.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: These taste great and are lower in calories than some of the other LARABARS. I also like that there is the added veggies to the mix. Nice flavor to add to the rotation of work out snack. Will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: John Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty and perfect for a quick snack! All whole foods, which works well with most dietary needs. Don't let the "greens" part fool you. They don't taste like kale at all.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Fox

customer_reviews.title: Best flavor
customer_reviews.text: These are by far my favorite Larabar. I only gave it 4 stars because at least 1 bar per box has shells or something in them and I nearly break my teeth! Otherwise—my fav!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Good and healthy
customer_reviews.text: These are great for a quick or on the go snack/meal. Made with only raw ingredients. Most have Dates as a main portion of ingredients. They are not necessarily low calorie though so be careful not to overeat. Definitely cheaper bought here in bulk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so sorry, but eating healthy should not taste this horrible. I love some of the other flavors but my dogs wouldn't even touch these. Tried putting the rest of the box out for the possums, rather than waste them. They didn't touch them either.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and good for you
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars. Great taste, usually I don’t like anything that is good for you but these taste great. I buy the strawberry spinach cashew. I just keep ordering more
customer_reviews.author: patches

customer_reviews.title: “Icky”
customer_reviews.text: Love larabars but we hate these pineapple kale ones. The smell and taste are terrible, or “icky” as my toddler says. I don’t understand how some people like these, maybe our box was spoilt?
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorites!
customer_reviews.text: I really try to get more veggies into my diet and this bar is great! It has spinach and it’s delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Elyse

customer_reviews.title: So good.
customer_reviews.text: These are so good. I hobbled them up quickly. The kale gave it a substantive, chewy texture, the cashew was salty and sweet, the fruit was not too sweet. Just right.
customer_reviews.author: Count

customer_reviews.title: good snack
customer_reviews.text: I put mine in the freezer so I can it it slowly. It is good for a filling snack and doesn't make me want to eat the whole box.
customer_reviews.author: tgm

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Fast order-processing and delivery. I love the fruit/green and cherry bars.
customer_reviews.author: JenniferStLouis

customer_reviews.title: Love these for breakfast bars
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste, texture and healthiness of these awesome bars. To me they are like a healthy version of a fruit roll up and much better tasting but similar texture maybe. Love these and will continue to buy more
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn R Beery

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste
customer_reviews.text: These are really good! I had never tasted them before and was a little hesitant to buy a pack of 15. I am glad I did. They taste great and I like getting the extra fruit and veggies in.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Open box
customer_reviews.text: Box had clearly been opened before it got to me. There was clear plastic tape wrapped around the box to keep it closed. Five bars were missing.
customer_reviews.author: Ariadne

customer_reviews.title: Delivered VERY HOT -- Affected Taste
customer_reviews.text: Typically this is my husband's favorite snack, but the 2 boxes delivered this month were so hot that it appears to have affected the flavor -- inedible. UGH...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm super disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two boxes of Lara bars, the Mango Spinach flavor from this listing. The box I received was previously opened. It was taped closed. It also came with one missing bar. I'm super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: lemoncase

customer_reviews.title: and can have pretty hard bits in them (dried mango
customer_reviews.text: Delicious! Stick to the teeth a bit is the only downside, and can have pretty hard bits in them (dried mango, I think). They taste kind of like healthy fruit rollups.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.text: Love the bars, but these bars have an expiration date sooner than the order placed 4 months ago!.. they also feel stiffer than others. i just think they have been with the seller longer than i normally received
customer_reviews.author: M. roberts

customer_reviews.title: so i knew I loved the taste
customer_reviews.text: I tried these before I bought a box, so i knew I loved the taste. Kind of like a weird fruit roll up taste? Handy for my purse and car on trips and fill you up.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy B.

customer_reviews.title: Inedible
customer_reviews.text: I took one bite, made myself chew it up and thew the rest away. Tastes like grass.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great healthy snack
customer_reviews.text: All ingredients you recognize and has fabulous flavor. It’s easy to grab when you need a little sweet with your nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Marie

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably tasty
customer_reviews.text: I try to keep from eating foods with added sugar or artificial sweeteners. These bars taste pretty darn good for having none of that.
customer_reviews.author: CSF

customer_reviews.title: Yuk
customer_reviews.text: Yuk. I discovered I don't like Lara Bars after I bought a whole box. They are too sweet and don't taste good.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: They are definitely delicious! Helps me get through the day and when I need something sweet. But so expensive compared to other Lara bars from the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: M.J.

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I loved the Odawalla fruit bars and have been looking for a replacement ever since they stopped selling them. These are every bit as good. Tastes very good.
customer_reviews.author: Rich DuBose

customer_reviews.title: Try other flavors
customer_reviews.text: Generally love Lara bars but this is not my favorite flavors. My daughter loves it though. Try the pecan pie!!
customer_reviews.author: SteveRup

customer_reviews.title: Great product BUT the box did not include 15 bars ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product BUT the box did not include 15 bars as advertised. Not a huge loss but if they tell you 15, its nice to get 15.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon May

customer_reviews.title: Natural Laxative!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a three week training exercise with the army. After eating nothing but MREs and Hot A's for a while, things have a tendency to stop moving, if you catch my drift. These things will certainly come to the rescue, and they don't taste bad either.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not so tasty
customer_reviews.text: Not as yummy as the original larabars, taste more like dried fruit and spinach than a yummy bar, but I understand that it's probably hard to get spinach to taste good in a bar :/
customer_reviews.author: Clk

customer_reviews.title: Would Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: Tasty and nutritious. Trying to get more greens into my diet, these have been easy to add. They are small and can be eaten quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Scotch979

customer_reviews.title: Worst tasting food ever!
customer_reviews.text: If I could review with zero stars, I would. Worst tasting Larabar ever. Cant imagine what they were thing. Could even give them away
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Delicious but a little pricey
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to find and a little expensive. It tastes really delicious though and no sugar added!
customer_reviews.author: L. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Great snack.
customer_reviews.text: Delicious fruit/greens bars. Full of flavor and vitamins. Great snack.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Something weird in them
customer_reviews.text: There was something very hard in 3 of them that i ate. Couldn’t tell what it was. Almost broke my tooth. Was scared to eat anymore. And no it was NOT a nut.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: I prefer regular larabars better, but this has the added benefit of greens
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and generally healthy. I prefer regular larabars better, but this has the added benefit of greens. My favorite of the 3 fruits + greens flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Nitro

customer_reviews.title: yet mildly sweet. Over all pleasant
customer_reviews.text: Tastes very earthy, yet mildly sweet. Over all pleasant, I would eat them again if presented, however, I'll probably order other kinds of Larabars next time based on macronutrient counts.
customer_reviews.author: Rav n Hyo

customer_reviews.title: My first Date Free Lara Bar
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is absolutely fruity delicious. I've always eaten Lara Bars with dates. I really enjoy the texture, taste and lower calories in these.
customer_reviews.author: Magda Dream

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get all that I paid for but still delicious
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost the package arrived one bar short (only 14 out of 15). Also, the packaging was not adequate so the product arrived somewhat 'mushed' and the box itself was torn open. The bars themselves are delicious, though!
customer_reviews.author: D. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Bulk option would be nice
customer_reviews.text: One of the best flavors they offer, but sadly no option to buy in bulk up to save money. They run a little expensive, so buying more ones would be a nice option.
customer_reviews.author: Kellyn Antonacci

customer_reviews.title: Yummy for my tummy
customer_reviews.text: No soy. No gluten. No dairy. No added sugar. Super good. Super food.Whole30 friendly.
customer_reviews.author: B. P. Crues

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and filling
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I’m getting greens and fiber and I like the chewiness and flavor - not too sweet.
customer_reviews.author: F. Koper

customer_reviews.title: Meh, I'll stick to the normal larabar flavors
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to like these - I love most of the Larabar flavors, but this was too much. It's weird to have a bar that has differing densities - some of the fruit was harder on one side than the other. The flavor is just a bit odd
customer_reviews.author: Joseph H.

customer_reviews.title: Love the Pineapple Cashew taste!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Haven't been able to find them anywhere lately. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: DocBeiter

customer_reviews.title: Good ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: These are one of the few bars on the market that don't have some kind of added sugar.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: These can almost be a breakfast substitute. They're definitely good for on-the-go snacks. The texture is a bit dense and chewy because they don't have anything fake in them.
customer_reviews.author: Em Nukom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these larabars are great love the flavor and they are healthy
customer_reviews.author: wildmom

customer_reviews.title: The combination is just blah
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with these. I love the cherry and apple pie flavors but these are just sweet with no discernable pineapple or other fruit flavor and the kale just seems like an afterthought. will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: L. M. Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. Healthy, Whole30 approved, lower calorie than most other bars, and actually taste great!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect Number of Bars
customer_reviews.text: Not normally one to write a review, but the box appeared to be taped down rather than sealed. When I opened it up there were clearly bars missing from the advertised 15. While there were only a couple missing, I can't recommend this product to anyone if they are not getting what was advertised both on the box and on this site.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: I like other versions of Larabar better
customer_reviews.text: This one is a little too "gummy". I like other versions of Larabar better. But what I like in general about Larabar is that it has ingredients I recognize!
customer_reviews.author: HIdi

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE
customer_reviews.text: I love these and have them on "Subscribe and Save," They do lose one star, because on a half dozen or more occasions, I've found hard pieces in them, like maybe pieces of mango seed? That could hurt someone...
customer_reviews.author: LBH

customer_reviews.title: look good and not expired
customer_reviews.text: who cares if the box got smashed, all product intact and happy they arrived in time for my trip.
customer_reviews.author: Kellystime

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: Very odd tasting. Pineapple taste was very prominant but the kale made the bar taste very weird. I didnt care for the bar.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Best flavor!
customer_reviews.text: These are a treat to eat! Absolutely delicious and I feel good after eating it.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Huff

customer_reviews.title: The easiest way to get your greens
customer_reviews.text: These bars are one of the easiest ways to get your green veggies in. They taste great, not at all bitter. I love them and so does my son.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica T

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite Lara Bar, it tastes like strawberry fruit leather. Great snack to keep in my purse, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tasty snack
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy snack to provide extra greens, fruit, and nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick energy
customer_reviews.text: Love thes fruit and veg bars. Can’t find them in the store. Quick energy
customer_reviews.author: Mich M

product_meta.title: Larabar Strawberry Spinach Cashew Real Fruit Bars, Vegan, Gluten Free Healthy Snacks, 15 Bars
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Strawberry Spinach Cashew| Size:15 Count (Pack of 1)At Larabar we believe that real, wholesome food can be delicious when you mix a few carefully chosen ingredients. Larabar Fruits + Greens has a quarter cup of greens in each bar, but what you taste are the delicious and bright fruit flavors. They’re kosher, dairy-free, gluten free, and vegan, with no sugar added. Sign up for Amazon’s Subscribe & Save for up to 15% off plus regular and routine deliveries and free shipping, all with the ability to change or cancel a subscription at any time.Ingredients: Strawberry, Spinach, Cashews, Apricot, Unsweetened Apples
feature_bullets: WHOLESOME FOOD: Tasty and chewy snack bars that are Food Made From Food
REAL FLAVORS: 5-ingredient whole food bar made from a simple blend of strawberry, spinach, cashew, apricot, and unsweetened apples
SIMPLE INGREDIENTS: Gluten-free, non-GMO, dairy-free, vegan and Kosher
CONVENIENT: Wholesome snacks for a busy, on-the go snack Perfect for your active lifestyle

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
